definition: plug-in (software or hardware)/to plug in a component
to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Each plug-in has access to information about a personâ ™s current location whereabouts. The location information includes
sentences.chinese: 各插件都可訪問關於某人當前位置所在的信息。

sentences.english: No other plug-in can share the same identifier.
sentences.chinese: 任何其他插件都不能共用相同的標識符。

sentences.english: Now try to install the update site embedded with the signed plug-in.
sentences.chinese: 現在，嘗試通過帶簽名的插件安裝嵌入的更新站點。

sentences.english: Instead, the plug-in has its own console, but it does not support double-clicking.
sentences.chinese: 結果，該插件有自己的控制檯，但不支持雙擊。

sentences.english: The harness may include as one of the parts a Listed power supply cord.
sentences.chinese: 這種接插件可能包括列名電源線作爲其中的一個部件。

sentences.english: You can easily extend the custom plug-in to handle organization-specific coding standards. Here are some typical guidelines
sentences.chinese: 很容易通過擴展定製的插件處理組織特有的編碼標準。

sentences.english: This is in real life and you can't have addons sort out the mess for you.
sentences.chinese: 這是現實生活，沒有插件幫你清理包裹。

sentences.english: Beef up your Dolphin by installing your favorite Add-ons.
sentences.chinese: 通過安裝你喜愛的插件來加強你的海豚瀏覽器。

sentences.english: Next, a screen that allows you to edit the plug-in properties appears.
sentences.chinese: 接着會出現一個屏幕，您可以在其中編輯插件屬性。

sentences.english: A framework or plug-in may specify any number of implementation components.
sentences.chinese: 一個框架或插件可能指定許多實現組件。

sentences.english: The work products listed below have been introduced in this plug-in.
sentences.chinese: 如下所列的工作產品已包含在本插件中。

sentences.english: Extremely useful addon, for the advanced and basic user.
sentences.chinese: 非常有用的插件，爲先進和基本用戶。

sentences.english: Write a plugin in a C based language and compile it.
sentences.chinese: 基於C系語言編寫並且編譯插件。

sentences.english: By default, the plug-in perspective is launched.
sentences.chinese: 默認情況下，啓動插件透視圖。

sentences.english: Otherwise, your plug may burn out ahead of its time.
sentences.chinese: 否則，您的插件可能會燒出超越時代的。

sentences.english: Use an external editor to compose plain-text mail messages.
sentences.chinese: 一個使用外部編輯器編寫純文本信息的插件。

definition: a control (e.g. button, text box etc) (computing)
